clone.title: Contains settings to clone the repository into a container
clone.description:
Contains settings for when we clone your repository into a container. Settings here include:

* lfs - Support for Git lfs

* depth - the depth of the Git clone.

depth.description: Depth of Git clones for all pipelines (supported only for Git repositories)

lfs.description: Enables the download of LFS files in the clone (supported only for Git repositories)
